pr_title: Formatting gunnery skills string in one place to be easily updated.

timeline.message: Formatting gunnery skills string in one place to be easily updated.  Enforcing at least one of single gunnery skill or RPG gunnery skills.

timeline.body: If they have a GUNNERY attribute that is valid, when this falls thru you won't receive any helpful message. You'll just silently use the value from that attribute.
timeline.bodyText: If they have a GUNNERY attribute that is valid, when this falls thru you won't receive any helpful message. You'll just silently use the value from that attribute.
timeline.bodyHTML: If they have a GUNNERY attribute that is valid, when this falls thru you won't receive any helpful message. You'll just silently use the value from that attribute.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

timeline.message: Setting default values for RPG gunnery stats if gunnery stats aren't in the mul.

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
boolean rpgSkills = clientgui.getClient().getGame().getOptions().booleanOption(OptionsConstants.RPG_RPG_GUNNERY);
final boolean rpgSkills = clientgui.getClient().getGame().getOptions().booleanOption(OptionsConstants.RPG_RPG_GUNNERY);
timeline.author: Windchild292

timeline.body:
```suggestion
        final boolean hasGun = attributes.containsKey(GUNNERY) && (attributes.get(GUNNERY).length() > 0);
        final boolean hasRpgGun = attributes.containsKey(GUNNERYL) && (attributes.get(GUNNERYL).length() > 0) &&
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
boolean hasGun = attributes.containsKey(GUNNERY) && (attributes.get(GUNNERY).length() > 0);
boolean hasRpgGun = attributes.containsKey(GUNNERYL) && (attributes.get(GUNNERYL).length() > 0) &&
final boolean hasGun = attributes.containsKey(GUNNERY) && (attributes.get(GUNNERY).length() > 0);
final boolean hasRpgGun = attributes.containsKey(GUNNERYL) && (attributes.get(GUNNERYL).length() > 0) &&
timeline.author: Windchild292

timeline.body: This is misspelt, there should only be two n's in gunnery, not three.
